mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 6, 5) AS `rj`, COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{startTime} AND #{endTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 6, 5)
SELECT SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 7) AS `rj`, COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{startTime} AND #{endTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 7)

SELECT SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 12, 2) AS `rj`, COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{endTime} AND #{pEndTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 12, 2)

SELECT M.area_name, M.`count` AS mcount, M.lng, M.lat, IFNULL((M.`count` - P.`count`)/P.`count` * 100 , 0) AS rg FROM ( SELECT ta.area_name, COUNT(1) AS `count`, ts.lng, ts.lat, ta.area_id FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tiv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_area ta ON ts.area_id = ta.area_id WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{startTime} AND #{endTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY ts.site_id ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC) M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ta.area_name, COUNT(1) AS `count`, ts.lng, ts.lat, ta.area_id FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tiv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_area ta ON ts.area_id = ta.area_id WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{pStartTime} AND #{startTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY ts.site_id ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC) P ON M.area_id = P.area_id

SELECT N.mAreaName, N.mcount, N.lng, N.lat, IFNULL(((N.mcount - T.pcount)/(T.pcount) * 100), 0) AS rg FROM ( SELECT M.area_name AS mAreaName, M.mcount, M.area_id AS mAreaId, M.lng, M.lat FROM ( SELECT ta.area_name, COUNT(1) AS mcount, ta.area_id, ts.lng, ts.lat FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tiv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_area ta ON ts.area_id = ta.area_id WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{startTime} AND #{endTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY tiv.camera_id) M) N LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Q.pAreaName, Q.pAreaId, Q.pcount, Q.lng, Q.lat FROM ( SELECT p.area_name AS pAreaName, p.area_id AS pAreaId, p.`count` AS pcount, p.lng, p.lat FROM ( SELECT ta.area_name, COUNT(1) AS `count`, ta.area_id, ts.lng, ts.lat FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tiv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_area ta ON ts.area_id = ta.area_id WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{pStartTime} AND #{startTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY tiv.camera_id )p) Q) T ON N.mAreaId = T.pAreaId ORDER BY N.mcount DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT M.siteId, M.`count` AS mcount, P.`count` AS pcount, M.srcLng, M.srcLat, M.road_name, IFNULL((M.`count` - P.`count`)/P.`count` * 100, 0) AS rg FROM ( SELECT tiv.camera_id AS cameraId, COUNT(1) AS `count`, tc.site_id AS siteId, ts.lng AS srcLng, ts.lat AS srcLat, tr.road_name FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tiv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts on tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_road tr ON tc.road_id = tr.road_id WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{startTime} AND #{endTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY tiv.camera_id) M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tiv.camera_id AS cameraId, COUNT(1) AS `count`, tc.site_id AS siteId, ts.lng AS srcLng, ts.lat AS srcLat, tr.road_name FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tiv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts on tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN t_road tr ON tc.road_id = tr.road_id WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{pStartTime} AND #{startTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY tiv.camera_id) P ON M.siteId = P.siteId;
